pkgmetadata.longdescription: IPD IMGT/HLA and IPD KIR database for Homo sapiens // All alleles from the IPD IMGT/HLA https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ipd/imgt/hla/ and IPD KIR https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ipd/kir/ database for Homo sapiens. Reference: Robinson J, Maccari G, Marsh SGE, Walter L, Blokhuis J, Bimber B, Parham P, De Groot NG, Bontrop RE, Guethlein LA, and Hammond JA KIR Nomenclature in non-human species Immunogenetics (2018), in preparation.
